mapper.select: SELECT P.PRODNO,P.PRDOTITLENAME, PIMG.PRODIMGPATH, U.USERNO,U.UNICK, Q.QNANO,Q.QNATITLE ,Q.QNATEXT,Q.QNAREGDATE, QC.QNACATNO,QC.QNACATNAME FROM QNA q JOIN PRODUCT p ON P.PRODNO = Q.PRODNO JOIN PRODIMAGE PIMG ON PIMG.PRODNO = P.PRODNO JOIN USERS u ON U.USERNO = Q.USERNO JOIN QNACATEGORY QC ON QC.QNACATNO = Q.QNACATNO WHERE U.USERNO = #{userNo}
